body.name: Bellport 4 in 1 Convertible Mini/Portable Crib in Pebble Grey, Non-Toxic Finish, Made of Sustainable New Zealand Pinewood, with 3 Mattress Height Settings

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

features: CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS: Keep pace with your growing child’s changing needs with the Bellport 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib. Starting as a mini crib, you can convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately)

IDEAL FOR SMALL SPACES: The Bellport boasts a compact and modern design. Internally roomy, it occupies a small footprint, perfect for co-sharing and making the most of small nurseries. Product specs: 39L x 25.5W x 37.5H inches

LONG-LASTING BUY: The Bellport is made of durable, sustainable and renewable New Zealand pinewood. Choose from 4 pleasant non-toxic, child-safe, water-based finishes & combine with varying patterns and textures to create your dream nursery
MATTRESS COMPATIBILITY - Comes with 1" OEM Mattress pad. For additional aftermarket mattress purchase, we recommend any Dream On Me, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mini crib mattress.

PRIORITIZING SAFETY: Our cribs are designed with a focus on safety and tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and CPSC/ASTM safety standards. The max weight limit is 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.
body.description: The Bellport 4-in-1 Convertible Mini/Portable Crib is the ideal piece of nursery furniture that you need to match the changing needs of your growing child, while making the most of today’s s compact nurseries. Starting as a mini crib, convert it into a mini daybed and twin-size bed (bed rails sold separately) as needed. The Bellport boasts a clean design vibe. Internally roomy, its compact design means it occupies a small footprint, making it ideal for small nurseries or when you are co-sharing your room with your baby. You can choose from four pleasant non-toxic, child-safe water-based finishes and mix and match with other pieces of furniture and rugs to create a modern nursery. The crib has a 3-position adjustable mattress height setting that you can adjust as your child grows and comes with the regulatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit. Our cribs are designed with a focus on safety and tested for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed government and CPSC/ASTM safety standards. Maximum weight limit - 50 lbs. All tools/assembly instructions included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and easy to assemble.
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality for price, I thought. I purchased this mini crib because we live in a small apartment, and a standard crib would simply not fit in our allotted space.The seafoam green color is beautiful and exactly as pictured. Ours did not have nicks or dents. The instructions were easy to follow, and parts clearly labeled. I, a petite female, assembled fairly easily with very minimal assistance (just "hold this piece while I screw it in" sort of help was required, and only twice). Definitely would recommend to a friend!Only complaint would be I purchased a better mattress thinking it would fit, and it did not, but that is probably more my own fault than anything else. Still very glad I bought it!!! I am fairly certain it will last through at least two children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks exactly like the picture!
reviews.reviewText: I went through a lot of reviews and mini cribs on Amazon trying to pick the right one. I saw this seafoam green crib and I really liked the unique color. It looks exactly like the color online so I am happy with that. I didn't have any dents or damages on the crib itself. It did have a weird gray dark discoloration on the wood part the mattress goes on, but it isn't going to bother me since it will be covered with the mattress anyway. I like the backboard incase I decide to put the baby's name on it later. The thin mattress of course is really nothing but I went ahead and ordered a 4 inch mattress for it and it should come in a few days from amazon. I wanted this to be a space saver since baby will be in our room and our room had no space for a standard sized crib. We have limited space next to our king sized bed. But in the pics you can see it fits just right next to our huge bed. I did read reviews about the strong smell. Boy did this crib have such a strong smell. At first I couldn't handle how strong it was. The first few nights sleeping next to this crib was awful because of the smell. I almost slept on the couch lol. But after a little over a week the smell was gone and I even wiped it down with lysol wipes thinking it would help the smell go away faster. It was a little bit bothering. My boyfriend said nothing about it but man for me it was strong. It was easy instructions and I put it together real fast. Overall, I think it's super cute and I love it. I totally recommend, just build it in another room and let the smell go away first if you plan to have it in your room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for a small space
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the color of this bed…It’s a very sturdy crib and easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mini crib
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic size mini crib about the size of a pack and play but with a wooden frame it's absolutely beautiful I got the pea green color and we bought a different mattress I know it comes with the pad but it is very very thin we just put that on the bottom of the board and then put the mattress on top we spent less than $160 on a crib and mattress for my toddler she has plenty of room to grow in here read the directions very carefully and sort out screws while doing it and don't fasten all the bolts down very tight until it's all completely put together because you will have some trouble it took us two days to put it together granted we started at 10:00 p.m. the night that we got it and we didn't finish until 10:00 a.m. the next morning but we stopped about 11:00 the night that we got it and started about 8:30 9:00 the next morning we were working in a very small tight space which also didn't probably help but needless to say it is a great mini crib and I would definitely purchase again our crib didn't have any of the strong orders and the boxes damaged with the crib was not I know a lot of reviews were saying that as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Awesome crib if your looking for something that isn’t giant like other cribs on the market. good quality construction and sturdy materials. Well designed with the consumer in mind, it was super easy to put together. The sea foam color was perfect. Highly recommend purchasing this as it is well worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Starting with the packaging it came very well padded with lots of Styrofoam and separating sheets, nothing was severely damaged just had a couple edges that must have been bumped during packing so the paint was chipped. Assembly was very easy and the hardware was all very high grade. Once fully assembled it is very solid with my rocking or wobbling even when I applied pressure to it. It's not the heavy duty $600 cribs at Nebraska Furniture Mart but it is well built and holds together very well, as long as every couple months you re-torque all your bolts it feels like it should last at least 3 to 4 years and thats not a bad ROI and I love that green color, it's not shiny it's very matte so it looks even more premium as a result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the color and it was so easy to put together. It's the perfect size for my daughter. I was transitioning her from bassinet to crib and this one still fit in my room and through doorways!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars STINKY! Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: I read the reviews and took a chance anyway. The crib was easy to assemble, sturdy, and very attractive. It gets 1 star for that. When others say this crib had a chemical smell, they were not exaggerating. It’s AWFUL. We assembled it and put the mattress in, turned up our HEPA filter to high, waited 24 hours and the smell only got worse. We just could not put our baby in there to sleep in good faith. We disassembled and packed it back up to return, and the room STILL smells as well as the mattress and crib sheet we had in it. It’s terrible this crib hasn’t been taken off the market yet, but I can only imagine it’ll take some babies getting sick from it for them to listen. Learn from our mistake. Just don’t buy, it’s not worth the trouble!!!! Keep looking!
